mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_earning(postno, memberno, viewcnt, replycnt, goodcnt, badcnt, title, content, rdate) VALUES(post_earning_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.nickname FROM post_earning p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberno = m.memberno WHERE p.postno = #{postno}
